name: Mai Villa - Mai Uyen 2 Guest House
address: No.3, Tay Ho Company residences - Thon Hoang 5 - Co Nhue - Tu liem, Tu Liem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Nestled in the heart of Tu Liem District, Mai Villa - Mai Uyen 2 Guest House is an ideal spot from which to discover Hanoi. Only 9.2 km from the city center, the hotel's strategic location ensures that guests can quickly and easily reach many local points of interest. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

At Mai Villa - Mai Uyen 2 Guest House, every effort is made to make guests feel comfortable. To do so, the hotel provides the best in services and amenities. While lodging at this wonderful property, guests can enjoy free Wi-Fi in all rooms, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, newspapers, laundry service.

The ambiance of Mai Villa - Mai Uyen 2 Guest House is reflected in every guestroom. internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, mini bar, telephone are just some of the facilities that can be found throughout the property. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. With an ideal location and facilities to match, Mai Villa - Mai Uyen 2 Guest House hits the spot in many ways.
